channel.title: CISA KEV Catalog Updates
channel.description: This feed notifies when CISA updates the KEV catalog.

item.title: KEV Catalog Updated: 2025-04-08
item.description: CISA updated the KEV catalog on 2025-04-08. This update includes 2 new CVE(s): CVE-2025-29824, CVE-2025-30406
